text: static int data [ 100 ] [ 100 ] = { 0 } ; static int n ; static int max [ 100 ] = { 0 } ; static int solve ( int i , int j , int sum ) ; int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; int i , j ; int temp ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & data [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { max [ i ] = solve ( i , i , 0 ) ; } temp = max [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( max [ i ] > temp ) { temp = max [ i ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , temp ) ; } return 0 ; } static int solve ( int i , int j , int sum ) { sum += data [ i ] [ j ] ; if ( i == n - 1 ) { return sum ; } int a = solve ( i + 1 , j , sum ) ; int b = solve ( i + 1 , j + 1 , sum ) ; return ( a > b ) ? a : b ; }
